Literature.Title: Identification and characterization of novel antimicrobial decapeptides generated by combinatorial chemistry.
Literature.Author: Hong SY, Oh JE, Kwon M, Choi MJ, Lee JH, Lee BL, Moon HM, Lee KH

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=25µg/ml),Micrococcus luteus ATCC 9341(MIC=3.12µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 2592(MIC=3.12µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=1.56µg/ml),Proteus vulgaris ATCC 6380(MIC=>100µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 36232(MIC=3.12µg/ml)
